climbs.name: Under the Radar
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines and Patty Kline, April 2011

content.description:
Start a bit to the right, moving left to clip the first bolt, then climb thin edges (5.8) to easier slab climbing past 2 more Bolts. Traverse right across a dike, then straight up a steepening friction slab past 4 more bolts (5.8+).

The rock is grainy, but improving with every ascent.

From the top of a boulder, climb up past several horizontal cracks (small to medium cams) to reach a large, left trending overlap (medium cam). Step right from the overlap into a hole then climb up and left past three bolts to the top.
content.protection: Small to medium cams and three bolts protect the route. Tie the rope around a huge boulder for an anchor on top. There is a fixed anchor to the right of the top of this route to rappel from.
content.location: Start atop a boulder that is to the left of the pine tree above Hidden Slab Rightmost Route.

climbs.name: Secret Service
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines and Patty Kline, April 2011

content.description:
This is the leftmost route on the wall. Use the anchors for

Private Eye

to TR this climb. Start about ten feet up and left of

Private Eye

atop a small boulder (and downhill of a huge boulder in the corner). Climb straight up to the

Private Eye

anchor, staying left of

Private Eye

.
content.location: Start about ten feet up and left of Private Eye atop a small boulder (and downhill of a huge boulder in the corner).

content.description: Start about 20 feet right of Rodeo Doggie. Climb past two bolts to the top, ending just left of a pine tree.
content.protection: Two bolts protect the route. Either use the pine tree or bring medium cams for the anchor.
content.location: Start about 20 feet right of Rodeo Doggie.

climbs.name: Rodeo Doggie
climbs.fa: Kelly Vaught, Frank Bentwood, Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech

content.description: A crux bulge is surmounted then follow the bolts to bolted anchors.
content.location: This is the second from the right of four bolted lines on the Hidden Slab.

climbs.name: Private Eye
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines and Patty Kline, April 2011

content.description:
Climb a slab past 6 bolts to a ledge, then up a headwall with easier climbing to the top. The crux is smearing on edges and pure friction past the first 4 bolts. (5.10a)

The rock quality is less than perfect, but will only get better with traffic.
content.protection: 6 bolts, CDs from 1 to 1.5 inches. 2 bolt anchor 80 ft.

content.description: Go out left in an obvious horizontal crack to reach some varnished plates. Step up and clip a bolt. Continue up the varnished plates above to the summit and an anchor.
content.protection: Carry some wires and small to medium cams. Rappel with one rope from the anchor.
content.location: Start about 25 feet up and right of the middle route on the upper tier of Hidden Slab.

content.description: Toprope the slab between Under the Radar and Rodeo Doggie.
content.protection: Easily toproped from the Under the Radar bolt anchor.
